supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-14 (in mm), (1) 30 x 71, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 67 x 54, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, left (?) margin, (3) 67 x 48, 6 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (4) 55 x 43, (A) 6 lines, no (?) margins, (B) 4 lines, top margin, (5) 38 x 30, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (6) 47 x 17, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (7) 37 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins,, (B) blank, (8) 50 x 22, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (9) 46 x 37, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (10) 42 x 50, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (11) 55 x 55, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (12) 50 x 56, (A) 6 lines, left (?) margin, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (13) 55 x 44, (A) 3 lines, no margins (?), (B) 3 lines, traces, left margin, (14) 53 x 39, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank
